about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Bangalore based Valencia Nutrition Limited is an applied biotechnology startup. Valencia Nutrition Limited is engaged in developing, researching, marketing and quality control activities of high-quality nutraceutical products (multi-nutrient functional beverages which are used to prevent lifecycle related diseases). The company works under two brand names which are Bounce Superdrinks & VitaMe Enriched Beverage.

Under Bounce Superdrinks, Valencia sells out low-calorie hydration drink range including Vitalize, Sports, Glucose, Gluco Fizz, Lemon Fizz, and Jeera Fizz products. VitaMe brand consists of multi-nutrient drinks which are Watermelon Prebiotic, Guava Electrolite, Lemon - Lime Antioxidant Burst and Litchi- Mint Unwind. Valencia has an in-house research and development team to create formulations and add new products by testing and developing at final saleable forms. The company outsources the manufacturing, packaging, bottling and transportation work.

Competitive Strengths

1. Focus on product development and formulations
2. Develop products as per consumer preferences
3. Long Shelf Life of products
4. In-house R&D team

faqs.question: What is the Valencia IPO?
faqs.answer:
Valencia IPO is a SME IPO of 1572000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.23 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹46 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on December 23, 2019, and closes on December 27, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Valencia IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Valencia IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Valencia IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Valencia IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Valencia IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Valencia IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Valencia IPO opens on December 23, 2019 and closes on December 27, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Valencia IPO?
faqs.answer: Valencia IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,38,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Valencia IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Valencia IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
